content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x3)
- Inserter (position x4) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x5) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position x3

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory to craft the items. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need iron plates, which must be available in sufficient quantity.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when trying to craft items without the required crafting machine
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace required for the recipe you are attempting to craft.
